MultiplierBuildings.name: The Club & Guest House
MultiplierBuildings.description: (Click x2) Built in 1968, it features 34 hotel-style rooms, a restaurant, private meeting areas, and conference spaces.

MultiplierBuildings.name: University Center(UCEN)
MultiplierBuildings.description: (Click x4) Built in 1964, it is a student oriented environment that houses the campus bookstore, a food court, and other student services.

IncomeBuildings.name: De La Guerra Dining Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Click x8) Built in 1958, it was renovated in 2004 and has 25,000 square feet of dining space.

IncomeBuildings.name: San Miguel Residence Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Click x16) Built in 1962, it comprises of two, eight-story towers and has a mix of single, double, and triple rooms.

IncomeBuildings.name: San Nicholas Residence Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Click x32) Built in 1964, it is an eight-story building with a mix of single, double, and triple rooms.

IncomeBuildings.name: Santa Cruz Residence Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Click x64) Built in 1958, it is a two-story residence hall with triple rooms and a total of 600 residents.

IncomeBuildings.name: Anacapa Residence Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Click x128) Built in 1958, it is a two-story residence hall with triple rooms and a total of 600 residents.

IncomeBuildings.name: Carrillo Dining Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Click x256) Built in 1967, it is a dining hall with indoor and outdoor seating and a variety of food options.

IncomeBuildings.name: Ortega Dining Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Click x512) Built in 1956, it was the first permanent dining facility on campus.

MultiplierBuildings.name: Library
MultiplierBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 1954, the UCSB Library holds over 3 million volumes and is a center for research and study.

MultiplierBuildings.name: Student Resource Building(SRB)
MultiplierBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 2007, the SRB is a hub for student organizations and resources.

IncomeBuildings.name: Phelps Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 1965, it is a campus-shared classroom and office space.

IncomeBuildings.name: Campbell Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 1961, it is a lecture and recital hall that seats 862 people.

IncomeBuildings.name: Harold Frank Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 1965, it is a 60,000 square foot building that primarily houses the Computer Science, Electrical and Computer Engineering departments.

IncomeBuildings.name: Buchanan Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 1967, it is a lecture hall that seats 727 people across its 4 lecture halls and 1 classroom.

IncomeBuildings.name: Chemistry Building
IncomeBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 1964, it houses an impressive collection of Mass Spectrometry, NMR Spectroscopy, Optical Characterization, and X-ray facilities.

IncomeBuildings.name: Broida Hall
IncomeBuildings.description: (Auto Knowledge Generation +1/sec) Built in 1967, it houses the Physics Department and has 7 lecture halls/classrooms.
